name: OUT OF CONTROLS (TKDArts)
description:
Out Of Controls

Hi all gamers. This is my first game. The gameplay is worst :)
A simple platformer where you need to cross level by using the control button as you jumping object.

Instructions:


Controls:

A   -> Left
D   -> Right 
Space -> Jump

For android if it shows harmful to install its because you are installing app outside of play store .So, don't worry and install it and enjoy :)  

Credits:
Game Design ,  Programming,  Graphics  -> Me ( TKDArts )
